TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

summary.span: そのクラス定義に適用される別の特定の .NET Framework 属性も持つ要素上でのみ添付プロパティを参照できるように指定します。

span.span: Specifies that an attached property is only browsable on an element that also has another specific .NET Framework attribute applied to its class definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks この [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] の説明で使用されている `browsable` 用語の意味は に関する説明に似ていますが、添付プロパティの参照可能な状態は、主に [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 概念であるため、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]のプロパティ情報に特に関連します。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept. この [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] は、添付プロパティ定義の get アクセサーにのみ適用する必要があります。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions. Set アクセサーには、この [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] を適用しないでください。Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor. 直感的なのは、関連する要素の [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] を参照できるようにするための設定操作ですが、実際の動作を制御するプロパティを定義するプロパティの get アクセサーの存在と特性です。Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior. 添付プロパティの宣言に関する一般的な情報については、「[添付プロパティの概要](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md)」を参照してください。For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type attributeType) cil managed

param.name: attributeType
param.span: が適用されているクラスで添付プロパティを参照できるように、クラスでも適用する必要がある [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] の 。

span.span: The of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class in order for the attached property to be browsable on the class where is applied.

summary.span: クラスの新しいインスタンスを初期化します。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AttributeType As Type
public: property Type ^ AttributeType { Type ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: クラスでも適用する必要がある [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]の型を取得します。

span.span: Gets the type of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 値は、 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] コンストラクターの `attributeType` パラメーターを使用してのみ設定できます。The value can only be set through the `attributeType` parameter of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: この [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]のハッシュ コードを返します。

span.span: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

returns.span: 32 ビットの符号なし整数値。

remarks.format: ## Remarks この実装では、この属性によって公開される設定可能な値に基づいて、使用可能な複数のハッシュ値がサポートされます 。This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, .
